name: Solar Smasher
description:
Hi!

So as part of my final year project of university, i've been allocated the task of building an educational interactive tour of the Solar System. I thought the best way of doing this would be through a game that can be played on Android, iOS and desktop devices.

The links below provide a path to be able to download the game in your desired platform.

If you download the game please fill out my short survey on your playing and learning experiences!

Thank you!

adambayes.itch.io/solar-smasher (To play my game)

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1v-IZspwY_rfAqpTk... (Please fill out the short survey so I can obtain feedback for my project, takes 5 minutes tops!)
